function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased focus on occupant health in building design, construction, and operation due to the COVID-19 pandemic.","Impact":"If not addressed, buildings may still pose health risks to occupants, leading to potential disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety standards in building design and operations to reduce the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, touchless technology, antibacterial materials, and less dense layouts.","People":"Occupants, building professionals, construction experts.","Owner":"Building owners, architects, developers."},{"Description":"Greater attention to ventilation systems to maintain high indoor air quality and limit infection in indoor spaces.","Impact":"Inadequate ventilation may lead to poor indoor air quality and increase the risk of disease transmission among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Installation of advanced ventilation systems and regular maintenance to ensure optimal indoor air quality.","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems.","People":"Occupants, building professionals.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC experts."}]}
